00013 #define GLAZIERY_FIELDLAYOUTDATA(field, horizontalAlignment, verticalAlignment, columnSpan) \
00014    { \
00015       FieldLayoutData * layoutData = field->getFieldLayoutData(); \
00016       layoutData->setHorizontalAlignment(FieldLayoutData::ALIGN_##horizontalAlignment); \
00017       layoutData->setVerticalAlignment(FieldLayoutData::ALIGN_##verticalAlignment); \
00018       layoutData->setColumnSpan(columnSpan); \
00019    }
00020 
00021 #define GLAZIERY_FIELDLAYOUTDATA_MP(field, leftMargin, topMargin, rightMargin, bottomMargin, \
00022    leftPadding, topPadding, rightPadding, bottomPadding, \
00023    horizontalAlignment, verticalAlignment, columnSpan) \
00024    GLAZIERY_FIELDLAYOUTDATA(field, horizontalAlignment, verticalAlignment, columnSpan) \
00025    { \
00026       FieldLayoutData * layoutData = field->getFieldLayoutData(); \
00027       layoutData->setTopLeftMargin(Vector((leftMargin), (topMargin))); \
00028       layoutData->setBottomRightMargin(Vector((rightMargin), (bottomMargin))); \
00029       layoutData->setTopLeftPadding(Vector((leftPadding), (topPadding))); \
00030       layoutData->setBottomRightPadding(Vector((rightPadding), (bottomPadding))); \
00031    }
